overview:
Cuisine Sante International started in Montreal Canada in 2003 with just one product and one vision. The vision was to offer our customers the highest quality products at the lowest price point.

Our unique way of customer advertising combined with our direct relationship with our manufacturer allows Cuisine Sante International to deliver incredible value to each and every customer. Today Cuisine Sante International operated in over five (5) countries with distribution of over 23 products in every showroom. Our goal is to be in every country around the globe and to continue importing the best and highest quality products from all around the world to our customers without high markups.

Our Cuisine Sante International ChromoTanium Stainless Steel cookware is not only unique in quality and efficiency, but it is extremely easy to maintain. It will keep its look for many years to come. Maintenance is very easy. Just use soap, water and a sponge to clean. Never use abrasives and/or steel wool.
